microprocessor.name: Electric Engine Input Controller
microprocessor.description: A micro to control motors and engines

node.label: W/S
node.description: The input signal to be processed.

node.label: UP/DOWN
node.description: The input signal to be processed.

node.label: Motor Clutch
node.description: The input signal to be processed.

node.label: Engine RPS
node.description: The input signal to be processed.

node.label: Reverse
node.description: The input signal to be processed.

node.label: Engine RPS
node.description: The input signal to be processed.

object.script:
reverse = false motor = 0 rps = 0 engineRpsInput = 0 function onTick() inputMotor = input.getNumber(1) inputRps = input.getNumber(2) engineRpsInput = input.getNumber(3) reverse = input.getBool(1)
if inputMotor > 0 then motor = motor + 0.01 elseif inputMotor < 0 then motor = motor - 0.01 end
if reverse == false then motor = clamp(motor, 0, 1) else motor = clamp(motor, -1, 0) end
if engineRpsInput > 0 then if inputRps > 0 then rps = rps + 0.01 elseif inputRps < 0 then rps = rps - 0.01 end end
rps = clamp(rps, 0, 1)
output.setNumber(1, motor) output.setNumber(2, rps) end
function clamp(numberToClamp, min, max) if numberToClamp > max then return max elseif numberToClamp < min then return min else return numberToClamp end end

c0.script:
reverse = false motor = 0 rps = 0 engineRpsInput = 0 function onTick() inputMotor = input.getNumber(1) inputRps = input.getNumber(2) engineRpsInput = input.getNumber(3) reverse = input.getBool(1)
if inputMotor > 0 then motor = motor + 0.01 elseif inputMotor < 0 then motor = motor - 0.01 end
if reverse == false then motor = clamp(motor, 0, 1) else motor = clamp(motor, -1, 0) end
if engineRpsInput > 0 then if inputRps > 0 then rps = rps + 0.01 elseif inputRps < 0 then rps = rps - 0.01 end end
rps = clamp(rps, 0, 1)
output.setNumber(1, motor) output.setNumber(2, rps) end
function clamp(numberToClamp, min, max) if numberToClamp > max then return max elseif numberToClamp < min then return min else return numberToClamp end end
